content.en: Aerosol Algorithm Advancements: Scientists have been studying ways to improve the accuracy of aerosol measurements and retrievals using satellite data. These studies attribute the algorithms used to the National Environmental Satellite, Data, and Information Service, the Advanced Very High Resolution Radiometer (AVHRR), the POLDER instrument, and other satellite platforms. By developing and refining these algorithms, researchers hope to better understand aerosol properties and their impact on the environment.
content.da: Fremskridt inden for aerosol-algoritmer: Forskere har studeret måder at forbedre nøjagtigheden af aerosolmålinger og -indhentninger ved brug af satellitdata. Disse studier tilskriver algoritmerne til National Environmental Satellite, Data, and Information Service, Advanced Very High Resolution Radiometer (AVHRR), POLDER-instrumentet og andre satellitplatforme. Ved at udvikle og forfine disse algoritmer håber forskerne at få en bedre forståelse af aerosolers egenskaber og deres indvirkning på miljøet.
